Hydras Is one of the character that have left in charge  for another player 
that havent come back so it's mine now,

Windlord, Perceptor, Kup, Nighlight, Talon ELita

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Saturday, July 02, 2011 5:49 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: ATTN: ROLL CALL

I understand, perhaps 'pruning' wasn't the best word. 'Adjusting'
might fit better. That was the plan, to move characters to inactive.

What about the made up characters who's creators have left the game.
Shall we keep them on the list too? I don't think they will get
players for them.

- Preston

On 7/1/11, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
> Titobeau/Kraftlos --
>
> Celeron (currently alligned with the Bushido Predicons, but not
> ideologically a pred)
>
> Trelos (Predicon loosely under Hydras' command)
>
> Pacificus Maximals - Lord Perseus, Salveo, Guardia, Ravenchief, 
> Depthcharge.
>
> Doc and Kenzo aren't mine by are technically part of the group.  I tend to
> use Kenzo as an NPC doctor, Doc hasn't been used in months so we can put 
> him
> aside til his owner wants him.
>
> My original intention with the character list was to list all characters,
> but we may want to break out a separate section at the top containing only
> active characters, then leave the rest as reference.  I don't support
> "pruning" in the sense of removing old characters, but it would be better 
> to
> distinguish which ones are being used.
